00005 /*********************************************************************
00006                 Processes a host's incoming acks
00007 *********************************************************************/
00008 
00009 void
00010 tcp_host_process_ack(tcp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tcp_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00011 {
00012         int             ack;
00013         tw_stime        ts = 0.0;
00014 
00015 #if TCP_DEBUG
00016         printf(" should work %d %d %d\n",msg->ack , msg->seq_num, lp->id);
00017 #endif
00018 
00019         if ((bf->c2 = (state->unack <= msg->ack)))
00020         {
00021                 // printf(" should work %d %d %d\n",msg->ack , msg->seq_num, lp->id);
00022                 if ((bf->c9 = (msg->ack >= state->seq_num)))
00023                 {                                               // CHANGE
00024                         msg->RC.seq_num = state->seq_num;
00025                         // printf("new seq %d \n",state->seq_num);
00026                         state->seq_num = msg->ack + state->mss;
00027                 }
00028 
00029                 msg->RC.dup_count = state->dup_count;
00030                 state->dup_count = 0;
00031 
00032                 ack = state->unack;
00033                 state->unack = msg->ack + state->mss;
00034                 tcp_update_cwnd(state, bf, msg, lp);
00035 
00036                 /*
00037                  * Prints the time it took to transfer, the rate and congestion
00038                  * window size     
00039                  */
00040 
00041                 if (state->unack >= state->len)
00042                 {
00043                         printf
00044                                 ("\n\t\tTransfer Time = %f at %f kbps \n\t\tCWND = %f lp = %ld\n\n",
00045                                  (tw_now(lp) - state->start_time),
00046                                  ((state->len) / (tw_now(lp) - state->start_time)) / 1000,
00047                                  state->cwnd, lp->id);
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 tcp_update_rtt(state, bf, msg, lp);
00051 
00052                 msg->seq_num = 0;
00053                 msg->RC.lastsent = state->lastsent;
00054 
00055                 if (state->lastsent < tw_now(lp))
00056                         state->lastsent = tw_now(lp);
00057                 else
00058                         ts = state->lastsent - tw_now(lp);
00059 
00060                 ts += state->host->link->delay;
00061                 while (state->seq_num < state->len &&
00062                            (state->seq_num + state->mss) <=
00063                            (state->unack + min(state->cwnd, state->recv_wnd) * state->mss))
00064                 {
00065                         msg->seq_num++;
00066                         state->lastsent += TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth;
00067                         ts += TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth;
00068                         tcp_event_send(lp, FORWARD, lp->id, msg->src, 
00069                                         TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE, state->seq_num, 0, ts);
00070 
00071                         state->sent_packets++;
00072                         state->seq_num += state->mss;
00073                         // if(state->seq_num < 0 )
00074                         // tw_error(TW_LOC,"OverFlow\n");
00075                 }
00076                 msg->ack = ack;
00077         } else
00078         {
00079                 // printf("Invalid Ack %d\n", msg->ack);
00080                 if ((bf->c3 = ((state->unack - state->mss) == msg->ack)))
00081                 {
00082                         state->dup_count += 1;
00083                         if ((bf->c4 = (state->dup_count == 4)))
00084                         {
00085 
00086                                 msg->dst = state->ssthresh;
00087                                 state->ssthresh =
00088                                         (min(((int)state->cwnd + 1), state->recv_wnd) / 2) *
00089                                         state->mss;
00090                                 // CHANGED
00091                                 msg->RC.cwnd = state->cwnd;
00092                                 state->cwnd = 1;
00093 
00094                                 msg->RC.lastsent = state->lastsent;
00095                                 if (state->lastsent < tw_now(lp))
00096                                         state->lastsent = tw_now(lp);
00097                                 else
00098                                         ts = state->lastsent - tw_now(lp);
00099 
00100                                 state->lastsent +=
00101                                         TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth;
00102 
00103                                 ts += (TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE /
00104                                            state->host->link->bandwidth + state->host->link->delay);
00105                                 tcp_event_send(lp, FORWARD, lp->id, msg->src, 
00106                                                 TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE, state->unack, 
00107                                                 0, ts);
00108 
00109                                 msg->ack = state->seq_num;
00110                                 state->seq_num = state->unack + state->mss;
00111 
00112                                 // CHANGE Maybe.
00113                                 state->rto_seq++;
00114 
00115                                 if ((bf->c13 = (state->timer != NULL)))
00116                                 {
00117                                         if(NULL != state->timer->memory)
00118                                                 b = state->timer->memory;
00119                                         else
00120                                         {
00121                                                 b = tw_memory_alloc(lp, g_tcp_fd);
00122                                                 tw_event_memory_set(state->timer, b, g_tcp_fd);
00123                                         }
00124 
00125                                         m = tw_memory_data(b);
00126 
00127                                         msg->RC.timer_ts = state->timer->recv_ts;
00128                                         msg->RC.timer_seq = m->seq_num;
00129 
00130                                         rn_timer_reset(lp, &(state->timer),
00131                                                            tw_now(lp) + state->rto);
00132 
00133                                         if (state->timer)
00134                                         {
00135                                                 m->seq_num = state->unack;
00136                                                 tw_event_memory_set(state->timer,
00137                                                                         b, g_tcp_fd);
00138                                         }
00139                                 }
00140 
00141                                 // state-save variables into event
00142                                 msg->RC.seq_num = state->rtt_seq;
00143                                 state->rtt_seq = state->unack;
00144 
00145                                 msg->RC.rtt_time = state->rtt_time;
00146                                 state->rtt_time = 0;
00147                         }
00148                 }
00149         }
00150 }

00152 /*
00153  * tcp_process_data: Processes incoming data for a host
00154  */
00155 void
00156 tcp_host_process_data(tcp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tcp_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00157 {
00158         tw_stime        ts = 0.0;
00159 
00160         if ((bf->c2 = (msg->seq_num == state->seq_num)))
00161         {
00162                 state->received_packets++;
00163                 msg->RC.lastsent = state->lastsent;
00164                 if (state->lastsent < tw_now(lp))
00165                 {
00166                         state->lastsent = tw_now(lp);
00167                         ts = state->host->link->delay +
00168                                 TCP_HEADER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth;
00169                 } else
00170                 {
00171                         ts = (state->lastsent - tw_now(lp)) +
00172                                 TCP_HEADER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth +
00173                                 state->host->link->delay;
00174                         state->lastsent += TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth;
00175                 }
00176 
00177                 msg->RC.dup_count = 0;
00178                 state->seq_num += state->mss;
00179                 while(state->out_of_order[(state->seq_num / (int)state->mss) % state->recv_wnd])
00180                 {
00181                         msg->RC.dup_count++;
00182                         state->out_of_order[(state->seq_num / (int)state->mss) %
00183                                                                 state->recv_wnd] = 0;
00184                         state->seq_num += state->mss;
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 tcp_event_send(lp, FORWARD, lp->id, msg->src, TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE,
00188                                            0, state->seq_num - state->mss, ts);
00189         } else
00190         {
00191                 msg->RC.lastsent = state->lastsent;
00192                 if (state->lastsent < tw_now(lp))
00193                 {
00194                         state->lastsent = tw_now(lp);
00195                         ts = state->host->link->delay +
00196                                 TCP_HEADER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth;
00197                 } else
00198                 {
00199                         // printf("why 1 %f %f %d\n", state->lastsent, tw_now(lp),
00200                         // state->seq_num);
00201                         ts = (state->lastsent - tw_now(lp)) +
00202                                 TCP_HEADER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth +
00203                                 state->host->link->delay;
00204                         state->lastsent += TCP_HEADER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth;
00205                 }
00206 
00207                 if ((bf->c3 = (msg->seq_num > state->seq_num)))
00208                 {
00209                         if ((bf->c4 =
00210                                  (msg->seq_num > (state->seq_num + state->recv_wnd * state->mss
00211                                                                 /*
00212                                                                  * TCP_SND_WND 
00213                                                                  */  - state->mss))))
00214                         {
00215                                 // look up need rc code CHANGE
00216                                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "revc_wnd buffer overflow %d %d\n",
00217                                                  msg->seq_num, state->seq_num + TCP_SND_WND - state->mss);
00218                         } else
00219                         {
00220                                 /*
00221                                  * printf("msg %d window %d, loc %d\n", msg->seq_num,
00222                                  * (state->seq_num + TCP_SND_WND - state->mss), (msg->seq_num /
00223                                  * state->mss) % state->recv_wnd); 
00224                                  */
00225                                 state->out_of_order[(msg->seq_num / state->mss) % state->recv_wnd] =
00226                                         1;
00227                         }
00228                 }
00229 
00230                 tcp_event_send(lp, FORWARD, lp->id, msg->src, TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE,
00231                                            0, state->seq_num - state->mss, ts);
00232 
00233         }
00234 
00235 }

00238 /*********************************************************************
00239                           Updates the cwnd
00240 *********************************************************************/
00241 
00242 void
00243 tcp_host_update_cwnd(tcp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tcp_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00244 {
00245         if ((bf->c3 =
00246                  ((state->cwnd * state->mss) < state->ssthresh
00247                   && state->cwnd * state->mss < TCP_SND_WND)))
00248         {
00249                 msg->RC.cwnd = state->cwnd;
00250                 state->cwnd += 1;
00251         } else if ((bf->c4 = (state->cwnd * state->mss < TCP_SND_WND)))
00252         {
00253                 msg->RC.cwnd = state->cwnd;
00254                 state->cwnd += 1 / state->cwnd;
00255         }
00256 
00257 }

00260 /*********************************************************************
00261                           Updates the rtt
00262 *********************************************************************/
00263 
00264 void
00265 tcp_host_update_rtt(tcp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tcp_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00266 {
00267         tw_memory       *b;
00268 
00269         tcp_message     *m;
00270 
00271         if ((bf->c5 = (msg->ack == state->rtt_seq && state->unack < state->len)))
00272         {
00273                 if ((bf->c6 = (state->rtt_time != 0)))
00274                 {
00275                         msg->dst = state->rto;
00276                         state->rto =
00277                                 .875 * state->rto +
00278                                 (10 * (tw_now(lp) - state->rtt_time)) * .125;
00279 
00280                 }
00281 
00282                 msg->RC.rtt_seq = state->rtt_seq;
00283                 msg->RC.rtt_time = state->rtt_time;
00284 
00285                 state->rtt_time = tw_now(lp);
00286                 state->rtt_seq = state->seq_num;
00287                 state->rto_seq++;
00288 
00289                 if ((bf->c13 = (state->timer != NULL)))
00290                 {
00291                         if(NULL != state->timer->memory)
00292                                 b = state->timer->memory;
00293                         else
00294                         {
00295                                 b = tw_memory_alloc(lp, g_tcp_fd);
00296                                 tw_event_memory_set(state->timer, b, g_tcp_fd);
00297                         }
00298 
00299                         m = tw_memory_data(b);
00300 
00301                         msg->RC.timer_ts = state->timer->recv_ts;
00302                         msg->RC.timer_seq = m->seq_num;
00303 
00304                         rn_timer_reset(lp, &(state->timer), tw_now(lp) + state->rto);
00305 
00306                         if (state->timer)
00307                                 m->seq_num = state->unack;
00308                 }
00309 
00310                 // tcp_event_send(lp, RTO, msg->src, lp->id, state->seq_num,
00311                 // state->rto_seq, state->rto);
00312         } else if((bf->c7 = (msg->ack > state->rtt_seq && state->unack < state->len)))
00313         {
00314                 msg->RC.rtt_seq = state->rtt_seq;
00315                 msg->RC.rtt_time = state->rtt_time;
00316                 state->rtt_time = tw_now(lp);
00317                 state->rtt_seq = state->seq_num;
00318 
00319                 state->rto_seq++;
00320 
00321                 if ((bf->c13 = (state->timer != NULL)))
00322                 {
00323                         if(NULL != state->timer->memory)
00324                                 b = state->timer->memory;
00325                         else
00326                         {
00327                                 b = tw_memory_alloc(lp, g_tcp_fd);
00328                                 tw_event_memory_set(state->timer, b, g_tcp_fd);
00329                         }
00330 
00331                         m = tw_memory_data(b);
00332 
00333                         msg->RC.timer_ts = state->timer->recv_ts;
00334                         msg->RC.timer_seq = m->seq_num;
00335 
00336                         rn_timer_reset(lp, &(state->timer), tw_now(lp) + state->rto);
00337 
00338                         if (state->timer)
00339                                 m->seq_num = state->unack;
00340                 }
00341 
00342                 // tcp_event_send(lp, RTO, msg->src, lp->id, state->seq_num,
00343                 // state->rto_seq, state->rto);
00344         }
00345 }

00348 /*********************************************************************
00349  Check if the timeout is valid, if so it restransmits the lost packet 
00350 *********************************************************************/
00351 
00352 void
00353 tcp_host_timeout(tcp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tcp_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00354 {
00355         tw_memory       *b;
00356 
00357         tcp_message     *m;
00358 
00359 #if TCP_DEBUG
00360         printf("bw %d de %f last %f \n", state->host->link->bandwidth, 
00361                 state->host->link->delay, state->lastsent);
00362 #endif
00363 
00364         if ((bf->c1 = (msg->seq_num >= state->unack && state->unack < state->len)))
00365         {
00366 #if TCP_DEBUG
00367                 printf("should timeout %f %d %f\n", tw_now(lp), lp->id, 
00368                         state->lastsent );
00369 #endif
00370 
00371                 msg->dst = state->ssthresh;
00372                 state->ssthresh = (min(((int)state->cwnd + 1), state->recv_wnd) / 2) *
00373                         state->mss;
00374 
00375                 // CHANGED
00376                 msg->RC.cwnd = state->cwnd;
00377                 state->cwnd = 1;
00378 
00379                 msg->RC.lastsent = state->lastsent;
00380                 if (state->lastsent < tw_now(lp))
00381                         state->lastsent = tw_now(lp);
00382                 state->lastsent += TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE / state->host->link->bandwidth;
00383 
00384 #if TCP_DEBUG
00385                 printf("bw %d de %f last %f \n", state->host->link->bandwidth, 
00386                         state->host->link->delay, state->lastsent);
00387 #endif
00388 
00389                 tcp_event_send(lp, FORWARD, lp->id, msg->src, TCP_TRANSFER_SIZE,
00390                                 state->unack, 0, 
00391                                 state->lastsent - tw_now(lp) + 
00392                                         state->host->link->delay);
00393 
00394                 msg->ack = state->seq_num;
00395                 state->seq_num = state->unack + state->mss;
00396                 state->timedout_packets++;
00397 
00398                 msg->RC.dup_count = state->rto;
00399                 state->rto = state->rto * 2;    // PUT IN msgAX TImsgE CHANGE
00400 
00401                 state->rto_seq++;
00402 
00403                 msg->RC.timer = state->timer;
00404                 state->timer = rn_timer_init(lp, tw_now(lp) + state->rto);
00405 
00406                 if ((bf->c13 = (state->timer != NULL)))
00407                 {
00408                         if(NULL != state->timer->memory)
00409                                 b = state->timer->memory;
00410                         else
00411                         {
00412                                 b = tw_memory_alloc(lp, g_tcp_fd);
00413                                 tw_event_memory_set(state->timer, b, g_tcp_fd);
00414                         }
00415 
00416                         m = tw_memory_data(b);
00417 
00418                         m->src = msg->src;
00419                         m->seq_num = state->unack;
00420                         m->type = RTO;
00421 
00422                         tw_event_memory_set(state->timer, b, g_tcp_fd);
00423                 }
00424 
00425                 // state-save into event
00426                 msg->RC.rtt_seq = state->rtt_seq;
00427                 state->rtt_seq = state->unack;
00428 
00429                 msg->RC.rtt_time = state->rtt_time;
00430                 state->rtt_time = 0;
00431         }
00432 }
